title: Longjing Green Tea
description: Premium Dragon Well green tea from Hangzhou, known for its flat appearance and sweet, delicate flavor.

title: Da Hong Pao Oolong
description: Famous rock tea from Wuyi mountains with rich, roasted flavor and woody notes.

title: Yunnan Pu-erh
description: Aged fermented tea with earthy, smooth taste that improves with time.

title: Silver Needle White Tea
description: Delicate white tea with silver buds and subtle, sweet honey-like flavor.

title: Keemun Black Tea
description: Classic Chinese black tea with wine-like character and slight smoky notes.

title: Jasmine Pearl Tea
description: Hand-rolled green tea scented with fresh jasmine blossoms.

title: Tie Guan Yin Oolong
description: Traditional Iron Goddess of Mercy oolong with orchid aroma and smooth finish.

title: Lapsang Souchong
description: Pine smoke-dried black tea with distinctive smoky flavor profile.
